content: NGO Chong Wah | School of Computing and Information Systems | School of Computing and Information Systems showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS NGO Chong Wah Full-time Faculty Lee Kong Chian Professor of Computer Science; Director, Human-Machine Collaborative Systems Cluster; ResWORK Fellow Research Statement Qualification PhD, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, 2000 Teaching Topics Operating System Concepts with Android Data Management Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to CHENG Yu Tong HUANG Donghao MITTAL Divya Nicole Anne Hui Ying TEO +65 68264818 cwngo@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas School of Computing and Information SystemsHuman-Machine Collaborative SystemsMultimedia SystemsLearning & WorkTechnology-Enhanced Learning & PedagogyFuture of WorkHealth & WellbeingAgeing & Mental HealthLifestyle & Wellness Strategic Priorities Digital Transformation
